info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 2:50AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Light snow this morning... Areas of light snow will move southward through North Central and Southwest MT this morning. New snow accumulations of up to an inch are possible at lower elevations, and around 2 inches are possible in the mountains. Visibility could be reduced to near one mile at times this morning, with some roadways becoming snow covered and slippery. Those traveling through North Central or Southwest MT should be alert for quickly changing road conditions and areas of reduced visibility.
